name: Tehodoki Mahjong: Ny?mon-hen
description: Tehodoki Mahjong: Ny?mon-hen (Introduction Mahjong Initiation) is a Mahjong introductory game. It introduces the Chinese board game Mahjong to neophites of any age with simple tutorials and illustrations, starting from the basics and the different game modes. It features Mahjong champion Moriyama Shigekazu, under whose guidance and supervision the player is taught about the scoring rules, the terminology and the different game pieces through different lessons and quizzes.
alsoFor: PlayStation 3, PSP, PS Vita | Combined View
